availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Kentucky native. Married Lucy A. Faulconer Stephens in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1854. Farmer in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 207. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, unknown district, stamped p. 168. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky, Roll #994043, Kenton County Marriages, handwritten p. 2.
